sig_info: Iceman harnesses his Cryokinesis to chill the air around him to freezing temperatures. This causes his opponent to start the fight with a Coldsnap active, dealing 81 to 174.16 Energy Damage over 12 seconds and preventing them from Evading attacks. Additionally, Iceman can reform his Ice Armor 3 seconds faster.

ORGANIC ICE: Iceman’s Organic Ice form grants him full immunity to all Incinerate, Bleed and Poison effects.
PASSIVE: Iceman begins the fight with a layer of Ice Armor active, increasing his Armor Rating by 533.33.
If Iceman would lose more than 5% of his Max Health from a single source, his Ice Armor protects him from the blow, reducing the health loss to 5%, then it shatters.
If Iceman would become Stunned while his Ice Armor is active, the Ice Armor negates the effect, then shatters.
Once shattered, Ice Armor takes 15 seconds to reform.
CRITICAL HITS: 45% chance to place a Frostbite charge on the opponent. Frostbite charges are Passive, last for 10 second(s), and deal 68.85 Energy Damage when they expire.
HEAVY ATTACKS: This attack causes all Frostbite charges to expire instantly and deal an additional 20.25 Energy Damage each.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Places a Coldsnap on the opponent, dealing 117.45 Energy Damage over 9 seconds.
This attack stores up to 2 Frostbite charges on the opponent.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Iceman converts his Ice Armor into additional mass for his projectiles, gaining 121.5 additional Attack rating for the duration of the attack, at the cost of shattering his Ice Armor.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Places a Coldsnap on the opponent, dealing 149.85 Energy Damage over 9 seconds.
This attack instantly reforms Ice Armor.

SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Iceman converts his Ice Armor into additional mass for his projectiles, gaining 3694.5 additional Attack rating for the duration of the attack, at the cost of shattering his Ice Armor.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Places a Coldsnap on the opponent, dealing 4556.55 Energy Damage over 9 seconds.
This attack instantly reforms Ice Armor.

sig_info: Iceman harnesses his Cryokinesis to chill the air around him to freezing temperatures. This causes his opponent to start the fight with a Coldsnap active, dealing 2951.22 to 7174.54 Energy Damage over 12 seconds and preventing them from Evading attacks. Additionally, Iceman can reform his Ice Armor 3 seconds faster.

ORGANIC ICE: Iceman’s Organic Ice form grants him full immunity to all Incinerate, Bleed and Poison effects.
PASSIVE: Iceman begins the fight with a layer of Ice Armor active, increasing his Armor Rating by 716.67.
If Iceman would lose more than 5% of his Max Health from a single source, his Ice Armor protects him from the blow, reducing the health loss to 5%, then it shatters.
If Iceman would become Stunned while his Ice Armor is active, the Ice Armor negates the effect, then shatters.
Once shattered, Ice Armor takes 15 seconds to reform.
CRITICAL HITS: 45% chance to place a Frostbite charge on the opponent. Frostbite charges are Passive, last for 10 second(s), and deal 2483.7 Energy Damage when they expire.
HEAVY ATTACKS: This attack causes all Frostbite charges to expire instantly and deal an additional 730.5 Energy Damage each.

This attack stores up to 2 Frostbite charges on the opponent.

SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Places a Coldsnap on the opponent, dealing 5405.7 Energy Damage over 9 seconds.
This attack instantly reforms Ice Armor.
